question.text: Choose the option which rightly labells A, B, C and D in the figure given.

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>-</mo></math> light chains, <math><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>-</mo></math> heavy chain, <math><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>-</mo></math> antigen binding sites, <math><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>-</mo></math> disulphide bonds
